content: I'll probably break it down into smaller tasks, like sorting and purging one type of clothing at a time. I want to make sure I'm not overwhelmed and that I'm making intentional decisions about what to keep and what to let go of. I've got a rough idea of how I want to lay out my closet, but I'm open to adjusting as I go along. I'll probably start with the tops and work my way down to the shoes.
